channel.title: Questional ethics bugs
channel.description:
Hi,
I just played around (already finished game) and I started questional ethics and got first this bug which occured frequently since:
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
So this error message is in fact a soldier, when he's alive u see this error with a weapon floating above, once death u still see this error, but when u can pick up the weapon u got the weapon, but when u are full of ammo, the weapon still floats on the same place and u cannot go through it (pass it)
Next bug is those ambush one where u need to rescue the scientists, in the big lobby a group of soldiers shooting on u, from the ceiling, from everywhere, but normally another door needs to open with the last group of soldiers, this didn't happen, u can hear them scream, but the door doesn't go open, so totally stuck there, no trigger, nothing

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
UPDATE

Better face creating system found in Sector C is bugged, placed original file again and every soldier has now a body and no longer the word ERROR in red capital…

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Another bug when loading next level

Just shot with those big gun a hole in the wall, jumped down and got this error when loading next level:

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
I guess so, so if this is the problem, then the author needs to fix his own bug first…

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
I suggest you to use that backup.

Probably it’s an issue of that face mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
First I made a back up of my files, then I used those mod from here: https://filesmelt.com/dl/Better_Face_creation_system2.7z

So to have more different faces in the game.

I also used the mod with the houndeye fix

And ‘Planning to Change the Source VGUI to better fit Black Mesa’ mod

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
post a console log

You should find something like this:

“missing…” written in red

I agree with TehBoxNoob:
did you messed with files in models or materials directories?.

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
ERROR SUCCES
Did you messed with the Black Mesa files without knowing what you we’re doing?

Read full topic

item.title: Questional ethics bugs
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Hi,

I just played around (already finished game) and I started questional ethics and got first this bug which occured frequently since:

So this error message is in fact a soldier, when he’s alive u see this error with a weapon floating above, once death u still see this error, but when u can pick up the weapon u got the weapon, but when u are full of ammo, the weapon still floats on the same place and u cannot go through it (pass it)

Next bug is those ambush one where u need to rescue the scientists, in the big lobby a group of soldiers shooting on u, from the ceiling, from everywhere, but normally another door needs to open with the last group of soldiers, this didn’t happen, u can hear them scream, but the door doesn’t go open, so totally stuck there, no trigger, nothing
